torflow.title: TorFlow Visualization
torflow.description: TorFlow provides a visualization of the Tor network, showing the flow of traffic between countries. This tool helps security researchers understand global traffic patterns and potential surveillance points. The visualization is provided by Uncharted Software and represents anonymized Tor network data.
